title: Coaches on the Hot Seat
itunes:title: Coaches on the Hot Seat
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling, & Gregg Rosenthal – recap all the latest news from around the NFL including Joe Flacco's back injury, the Ravens' potential interest in Colin Kaepernick and Cardale Jones being traded to the Chargers. The heroes then discuss which coaches, QBs and GMs are on the hot seat this season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
